attributes.action: Deliberate acid attacks causing GBH should result in a very long prison term!
attributes.background: Acid attacks causing GBH are increasing and more lives are being ruined. The law needs to recognise the effect of these attacks on the individual, and their loved ones. This needs to be reflected in a long prison term with no parole for those who deliberately carry out these attacks!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109533
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
